questions.question: Off a serve, a passer sends the ball into the net. Another player recovers it. What's the call?

choices.answer: Point awarded to other team
Play continues with 1 touch remaning
Redo play and it's your teams serve
The passer receives a yellow card for endangering a teammate

questions.question: A setter is setting a ball when they misplace their hands and it spins quickly. Whats the call?

choices.answer: Play continues with 1 touch left.
Redo play with other team serving.
Setter is called out for a double. Point for the other team.
Redo play with your team serving.

questions.question: A pass is shanked and another player who isn't the setter sets the ball. What is the call?

choices.answer: Redo play with your team serving
Play continues with 1 hit left.
Redo play with other team serving
Point awarded to other team for a non-setter set.

questions.question: A rally is taking place when a ball rolls on court from the other team's side. Whats the call?

choices.answer: Red card given to the person who rolled the ball onto court.
Redo the play and the serve is given to whoever served last.
Point awarded to the opposite side the ball rolled onto.
Play continues and a player has to get it the court.

questions.question: The setter sets the ball tight to the net and the hitter has to lift it. What is the call?

choices.answer: Play redone and serve given to team that didn't lift.
Setter is given yellow card for setting too tight.
Play continues normally.
Point awarded to other team for a lift.

questions.question: A blocker touches the ball but it continues onto his side. How many touches do they have left?

choices.answer: None, the point is awarded to the team that hit.
Play is redone and serve given to the team that hit.

questions.question: A passer shanks the ball off the scoreboard. It bounces back and continues. Whats the call?

choices.answer: The play is redone due to an interference.
The play continues because it is perfectly legal.
The point is awarded to the opposite team.
A yellow card is given to the passer for a dangerous pass.

questions.question: A blocker stops the ball. It comes down on top of them and they pass it up. Whats the call?

choices.answer: The play continues with 2 touches.
The play is redone and serve is given to whoever served last
A point is awarded to the opposite team for a double touch.
The point is awarded to their side.

questions.question: The libero attacks the ball far behind the 10-foot line but jumps to hit it. Whats the call?

choices.answer: The play continues.
The play is redone and serve is given to whoever served last
The point is awarded to the opposite team.
The libero is given a yellow card for breaking the rules.

questions.question: A player is jump serving and their feet touch with the floor before the ball. Whats the call?

choices.answer: Serve is redone.
Point is awarded to other team.
Serve is executed normally and play begins.
Yellow card is given to server for poor serving.
